com.igeekinc.util.discburning.remote

Class DiscBurningRemoteProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.igeekinc.util.discburning.remote.DiscBurningRemoteProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BurnDeviceEventListener, DiscBurning, java.util.EventListener

    public class DiscBurningRemoteProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements DiscBurning, BurnDeviceEventListener
    DiscBurningRemoteProxy wrappers a remote DiscBurning and also provides a local site for events to be re-dispatched from
